title: Test Book
text:
Preface
This is a Test Quarto book.

title: 1  Data Load
text:
2 Data Load
Load data to DuckDB


Code
import duckdb
from palmerpenguins import load_penguins

con = duckdb.connect('my-db.duckdb')
df = load_penguins()
con.execute('CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS penguins AS SELECT * FROM df')
con.close()

title: 2  Penguins EDA
text:
2.1 Penguin Size and Mass by Sex and Species
Code
import duckdb
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

con = duckdb.connect('my-db.duckdb')
df = con.execute("SELECT * FROM penguins").fetchdf().dropna()
con.close()
Code
summary_df = (
    df.groupby(['species', 'sex'])
      .agg({col: 'mean' for col in df.columns if col.endswith('mm') or col.endswith('g')})
      .reset_index()
)
summary_df

title: 2  Penguins EDA
section: 2.2 Penguin Size vs Mass by Species
text:
2.2 Penguin Size vs Mass by Species


Code
sns.lmplot(
    data=df,
    x='bill_length_mm',
    y='body_mass_g',
    hue='species',
    aspect=1.5,
    height=6,
    legend=False
)
plt.legend(loc='upper left', bbox_to_anchor=(0.05, 0.95), title='Species')
plt.show()
